107 void getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(geometry_msgs::Quaternion orientation, double& roll,double& pitch, double& yaw)
108 {
109  tf::Quaternion quat;
110  // Suppress a weird warning that tells me to normalise the quats even though I do that.
111  if( ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Error) ) ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
112  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(orientation,quat);
113  if( ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Info) ) ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
114  quat.normalize();
115 
116  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(quat);
117 
118  mat.getRPY(roll, pitch,yaw);
119 
120 }

125 void waitForActionCompleted()
126 {
127  std::string temp_res="";
128  while(ros::ok())
129  {
130  ros::spinOnce();
131  lock_status.lock();
132  temp_res = result;
133  lock_status.unlock();
134 
135  if (temp_res=="Stopped")
136  {
137  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Status : " << temp_res);
138  //Wait a little extra for arm to settle due to inertia.
139  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
140  while(ros::Time::now()-start < ros::Duration(0.2)) ros::spinOnce();
141  break;
142  }
143  }
144 }

152 void setPoseForDirection(int direction, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& start_pose,double distance)
153 {
154  geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat;
155  switch(direction)
156  {
158  case ARC_DOWN :
159  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(rotation_step),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0)); //Turn down
160  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
161  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
162  start_pose.pose.position.y=0.01; // Slightly up
163  start_pose.pose.position.z=-0.01; // Slightly back
164  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
165  break;
166  case ARC_UP :
167  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(-rotation_step),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
168  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
169  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
170  start_pose.pose.position.y=-0.01;
171  start_pose.pose.position.z=0.01;
172  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
173  break;
174  case TRANSLATE_BACK :
175  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
176  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
177  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
178  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
179  start_pose.pose.position.z=-distance;
180  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
181  break;
182  case TRANSLATE_FRONT :
183  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
184  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
185  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
186  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
187  start_pose.pose.position.z=distance;
188  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
189  break;
190 
192  }
193 }

200 geometry_msgs::TwistStamped getTwistForDirection(int direction)
201 {
202  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist;
203  twist.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
204  twist.header.frame_id="j2s7s300_link_7";
205  switch(direction)
206  {
207  case ARC_DOWN:
208  ROS_INFO("Arc down");
209  twist.twist.linear.z=VEL_LIN_MAX;
210  twist.twist.angular.x=VEL_ANG_MAX;
211  break;
212 
213  case ARC_UP:
214  ROS_INFO("Arc up");
215  twist.twist.linear.z=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
216  twist.twist.angular.x=-VEL_ANG_MAX;
217  break;
218 
219  case TRANSLATE_BACK:
220  ROS_INFO("Translate back");
221  twist.twist.linear.x=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
222  break;
223 
224  case RAISE_CUP:
225  ROS_INFO("Raise Cup");
226  twist.twist.angular.x=VEL_ANG_MAX;
227  break;
228 
229  case LOWER_CUP:
230  ROS_INFO("Lower Cup");
231  twist.twist.angular.x=-VEL_ANG_MAX;
232  break;
233 
234  case TRANSLATE_UP:
235  ROS_INFO("Translate up");
236  twist.twist.linear.z=VEL_LIN_MAX;
237  break;
238 
239  case TRANSLATE_DOWN:
240  ROS_INFO("Translate down");
241  twist.twist.linear.z=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
242  break;
243 
244  }
245  return twist;
246 }

265 void publishTwistForDuration(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg, double duration)
266 {
267  ros::Time time_start = ros::Time::now();
268  while (ros::Time::now() - time_start < ros::Duration(duration))
269  {
270  ros::spinOnce();
271  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
272  }
273 }

280 void positionControlDriveForDirection(int direction, double distance)
281 {
282  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, pose_in_base;
283  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
284  //Wait for TF buffer to fill up
285  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
286  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
287 
288  while(ros::ok())
289  {
290  try
291  {
292  lock_pose.lock();
293  start_pose = current_pose;
294  lock_pose.unlock();
296  setPoseForDirection(direction, start_pose, distance);
297 
298  tf_listener.transformPose(BASE_FRAME,start_pose,pose_in_base);
299  break;
300 
301  }
302  catch (tf::ExtrapolationException e)
303  {
304  /* ROS_INFO_STREAM("Waiting for transform "
305  //<< e.what()
306  );*/
307  }
308  ros::spinOnce();
309  loop_rate.sleep();
310  }
311 
312  cmd_pos.publish(pose_in_base);
313 }
314 
319 bool isForceSafe()
320 {
321  double local_force_f;
322  lock_force.lock();
323  local_force_f=force_f;
324  lock_force.unlock();
325 
326  if (local_force_f >= FORCE_SAFETY)
327  {
328  ROS_WARN_STREAM("PAIN THRESHOLD BREACHED!!");
329  return false;
330  }
331  else
332  return true;
333 }
334 
339 bool isAudioSafe()
340 {
341  lock_emerg.lock();
342  bool emerg = emergency;
343  lock_emerg.unlock();
344 
345  if (emerg) ROS_WARN_STREAM("AUDIO EMERGENCY DETECTED!!");
346  return !emerg;
347 }

353 void fallback(bool emerg=false);

359 void driveToRollGoalWithVelocity(int direction)
360 {
362  if(direction == RAISE_CUP)
363  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Raise cup");
364  else if (direction == LOWER_CUP)
365  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Lower cup");
366  else
367  {
368  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Wrong direction given!!");
369  return;
370  }
371 
372  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, goal_pose, temp_pose;
373 
374  lock_pose.lock();
375  start_pose=current_pose;
376  lock_pose.unlock();
377 
378  double temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw;
379  double goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw;
380  double start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw;
381  double del_rol;
382 
383  goal_pose = start_pose;
384 
386  tf::Quaternion q_rot = tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(angles::from_degrees( direction==RAISE_CUP?rotation_step:-rotation_step),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0)); // Rotate about x by 20 degrees
387  tf::Quaternion q_start; tf::quaternionMsgToTF(start_pose.pose.orientation, q_start);
389  tf::Quaternion q_goal = q_start*q_rot;
390 
392  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_goal,goal_pose.pose.orientation);
393 
395  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
396  //ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
397  while(ros::ok())
398  {
399  lock_pose.lock();
400  temp_pose = current_pose;
401  lock_pose.unlock();
402 
403  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(goal_pose.pose.orientation, goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw);
404  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw);
405  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(start_pose.pose.orientation, start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw);
406 
408  if (goal_rol < 0 ) goal_rol = goal_rol + angles::from_degrees(360);
409  if (temp_rol < 0 ) temp_rol = temp_rol + angles::from_degrees(360);
410 
411  del_rol = goal_rol - temp_rol;
412 
414  if (std::fabs(del_rol)>=thresh_ang)
415  {
416  float linear_vel = 0.02;
417  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg;
418  twist_msg.twist.linear.x = 0;
419  twist_msg.twist.linear.y = 0;
420  // Comment out next line ONLY if using end-effector mode ie: Mode 1 on jostick is active and 4th blue LED on far right is active.
421 // twist_msg.twist.linear.z = direction==RAISE_CUP ? linear_vel : -linear_vel;
422  twist_msg.twist.angular.x= del_rol>0?VEL_ANG_MAX:-VEL_ANG_MAX;
423  twist_msg.twist.angular.y = 0;
424  twist_msg.twist.angular.z= 0;
425 
426  if(isForceSafe() && isAudioSafe())
427  {
428  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
429  }
430  else
431  {
432  ROS_WARN("ABORTING SEQUENCE!!!");
433  fallback(true);
434  ros::shutdown();
435  }
436  }
437  else
438  {
439  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Goal reached, breaking loop");
440  break;
441  }
442 
443  ros::spinOnce();
444  loop_rate.sleep();
445  }
446 
447 }
448 
455 void moveCup(int direction, double duration=VEL_CMD_DURATION, double distance=0.1)
456 {
458  if (direction==TRANSLATE_BACK || direction==TRANSLATE_FRONT)
459  {
460  positionControlDriveForDirection(direction, distance);
461  return;
462  }
464  else
465  {
466  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg = getTwistForDirection(direction);
467  publishTwistForDuration(twist_msg, duration);
468 
469  }
470  return;
471 }

510 void waitForPoseDataAvailable()
511 {
512  // This loop to wait until subscriber starts returning valid poses.
513  ros::Rate loop_rate(9);
514  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
515  while(ros::ok())
516  {
517  lock_pose.lock();
518  temp_pose = current_pose;
519  lock_pose.unlock();
520 
521  ros::spinOnce();
522  loop_rate.sleep();
523 
524  if (temp_pose.pose.position.x != 0) break;
525  }
526  ROS_INFO("Pose data available");
527 }

529 bool checkUpperAngleThreshold()
530 {
531  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
532 
533  lock_pose.lock();
534  temp_pose=current_pose;
535  lock_pose.unlock();
536 
537  double temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;
538  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation,temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);
539 
540  if ( angles::to_degrees(temp_roll) > UPPER_FEED_ANGLE_THRESH )
541  {
542  ROS_WARN_STREAM("MAX UPPER FEED ANGLE REACHED");
543  return false;
544  }
545  else
546  {
547  return true;
548  }
549 }
550 
551 bool checkLowerAngleThreshold()
552 {
553  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
554 
555  lock_pose.lock();
556  temp_pose=current_pose;
557  lock_pose.unlock();
558 
559  double temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;
560  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation,temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);
561 
562  if ((int)angles::to_degrees(temp_roll) - (int)angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh) < rotation_step/2 && temp_roll > 0)
563  {
564  //ROS_WARN_STREAM("MAX LOWER ANGLE REACHED. LIMIT: " << angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh) << " CURRENT: " << angles::to_degrees(temp_roll));
565  return false;
566  }
567  else
568  {
569 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current roll: " << sangles::to_degrees(temp_roll));
570  return true;
571  }
572 }
573 
578 double getCurrentRoll()
579 {
580  lock_pose.lock();
581  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose = current_pose;
582  lock_pose.unlock();
583 
584  double temp_rol, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;
585  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);
586 
587 
588  return temp_rol<0?temp_rol+angles::from_degrees(360):temp_rol;
589 }
590 
595 void callFallbackTimer(double duration)
596 {
597 
598  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
599  ros::Duration run_for(duration);
600  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
601  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Starting fallback timeout for: " << duration << "s.");
602  while(ros::Time::now() - start <= run_for)
603  {
604  lock_force.lock();
605  double force = force_f;
606  lock_force.unlock();
607 
608  if (force>= FORCE_F_2_3_THRESH)
609  {
610  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Force detected, breaking out of timer");
611  return;
612  }
613 
614  loop_rate.sleep();
615  ros::spinOnce();
616  }
617 
618  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Time out! Initialising fallback");
619  // moveCup(TRANSLATE_BACK);
620  fallback();
621  sleep(1);
622  ros::shutdown();
623 }
624 
625 void fallback(bool emerg)
626 {
627  lock_pose.lock();
628  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose=current_pose;
629  lock_pose.unlock();
630 
631  double roll, pitch, yaw;
632  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(start_pose.pose.orientation, roll, pitch, yaw);
633 
634  int yaw_degrees = angles::to_degrees(yaw);
635 
636  // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current yaw float: " << angles::to_degrees(yaw) << " int " << yaw_degrees);
637 
638  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_cmd;
639 
645  // y = mx + c
646  double m = 0.004444444;
647  double velx_c = 0.8;
648  double vely_c = 0.4;
649 
650 
656 
657  if (yaw_degrees >= -180 && yaw_degrees < -90)
658  {
659  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sector 1");
660  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = m * yaw_degrees + velx_c;
661  twist_cmd.twist.linear.y = m * yaw_degrees + vely_c;
662  }
663  else if (yaw_degrees >= -90 && yaw_degrees <0)
664  {
665  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sector 2");
666  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = -m * yaw_degrees;
667  twist_cmd.twist.linear.y = m * yaw_degrees + vely_c;
668  }
669  else if (yaw_degrees >= 0 && yaw_degrees <90)
670  {
671  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sector 3");
672  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = -m * yaw_degrees;
673  twist_cmd.twist.linear.y = -m * yaw_degrees + vely_c;
674  }
675  else if (yaw_degrees >= 90 && yaw_degrees <=180)
676  {
677  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sector 4");
678  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = m * yaw_degrees - velx_c;
679  twist_cmd.twist.linear.y = -m * yaw_degrees + vely_c;
680  }
681  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Publishing twist : ");
682  //std::cout << (twist_cmd) << std::endl;
683  if (emerg==true) twist_cmd.twist.angular.x = -1;
684  publishTwistForDuration(twist_cmd,1);
685 }
686 
690 class CSVReader
691 {
692  std::string fileName;
693  std::string delimeter;
694 
695 public:
696  CSVReader(std::string filename, std::string delm = ",") :
697  fileName(filename), delimeter(delm)
698  { }
699 
700  // Function to fetch data from a CSV File
701  std::vector<std::vector<std::string> > getData();
702 };
703 
708 std::vector<std::vector<std::string> > CSVReader::getData()
709 {
710  std::ifstream file(fileName);
711 
712  std::vector<std::vector<std::string> > dataList;
713 
714  std::string line = "";
715  // Iterate through each line and split the content using delimeter
716  while (getline(file, line))
717  {
718  std::vector<std::string> vec;
719  boost::algorithm::split(vec, line, boost::is_any_of(delimeter));
720  dataList.push_back(vec);
721  }
722  // Close the File
723  file.close();
724 
725  return dataList;
726 }
727 
733 std::vector<std::vector<float>> getGMRFromCsv(std::string file)
734 {
735 
736  CSVReader reader(file);
737 
738  std::vector<std::vector<std::string> > dataList = reader.getData();
739 
740  int RR = dataList.size();
741  int CC = dataList[0].size();
742  std::vector<std::vector<float>> gmr(RR);
743  for ( int i = 0 ; i < RR ; i++ )
744  gmr[i].resize(CC);
745 
746  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Fetching GMR data from " << file );
747  for (int i=0; i<dataList.size(); i++)
748  {
749  std::vector<std::string> vec = dataList[i];
750  for(int j=0; j< vec.size();j++ )
751  {
752  gmr[i][j]= std::stof(vec[j]);
753  }
754  }
755  return gmr;
756 }
757 
758 
764 std::vector<std::vector<float>> getPoseDeltaFromGMR(std::vector<std::vector<float>> gmr)
765 {
766 
767 
768  int RR = gmr.size();
769  int CC = 6; // 6 columns for deltas in x,y,z,roll,pitch,yaw
770  std::vector<std::vector<float>> pose_delta(RR);
771  for ( int i = 0 ; i < RR ; i++ )
772  pose_delta[i].resize(CC);
773 
774 
775  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped first_pose;
776  first_pose.pose.position.x = gmr[0][1]; //columen 0 is index number, dropping it
777  first_pose.pose.position.y = gmr[0][2];
778  first_pose.pose.position.z = gmr[0][3];
779  first_pose.pose.orientation.x = gmr[0][4];
780  first_pose.pose.orientation.y = gmr[0][5];
781  first_pose.pose.orientation.z = gmr[0][6];
782  first_pose.pose.orientation.w = gmr[0][7];
783  double roll_first, pitch_first, yaw_first;
784  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(first_pose.pose.orientation, roll_first, pitch_first, yaw_first);
785 
786 
787 
788 // First row/pose is always 0 since it is the reference point.
789  for (int i=0; i<RR; i++)
790  {
791  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped current_pose;
792  current_pose.pose.position.x = gmr[i][1]; //columen 0 is index number, dropping it
793  current_pose.pose.position.y = gmr[i][2];
794  current_pose.pose.position.z = gmr[i][3];
795  current_pose.pose.orientation.x = gmr[i][4];
796  current_pose.pose.orientation.y = gmr[i][5];
797  current_pose.pose.orientation.z = gmr[i][6];
798  current_pose.pose.orientation.w = gmr[i][7];
799 
800  double roll_curr, pitch_curr, yaw_curr;
801 
802  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(current_pose.pose.orientation,roll_curr, pitch_curr, yaw_curr);
803 
804 
805  double delta_roll, delta_pitch, delta_yaw;
806  delta_roll = roll_curr - roll_first ;
807  delta_pitch = pitch_curr - pitch_first ;
808  delta_yaw = yaw_curr - yaw_first;
809 
810  pose_delta[i][0] = current_pose.pose.position.x - first_pose.pose.position.x;
811  pose_delta[i][1] = current_pose.pose.position.y - first_pose.pose.position.y;
812  pose_delta[i][2] = current_pose.pose.position.z - first_pose.pose.position.z;
813  pose_delta[i][3] = delta_roll; // Forward feeding approach changes only roll. Change in pitch and yaw <1° and hence ignored. Direct addition of single euler angle works between quaternions. NOT multiple angles.
814 // pose_delta[i][4] = delta_pitch; // Even if there are pitches and yaws due to human error, they need to be suppressed to avoid_discomfort to the user/spillage_.
815 // pose_delta[i][5] = delta_yaw;
816  }
817 
818  return pose_delta;
819 }
820 
831 geometry_msgs::PoseStamped getNewPoseAtIndex(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped starting_pose, int new_index_in_trajectory, std::vector<std::vector<float>> pose_delta_subsampled )
832 {
833  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped new_pose;
834  new_pose.pose.position.x = starting_pose.pose.position.x + pose_delta_subsampled[new_index_in_trajectory][0];
835  new_pose.pose.position.y = starting_pose.pose.position.y + pose_delta_subsampled[new_index_in_trajectory][1];
836  new_pose.pose.position.z = starting_pose.pose.position.z + pose_delta_subsampled[new_index_in_trajectory][2];
837 
838  double starting_roll, starting_pitch, starting_yaw, new_roll, new_pitch, new_yaw;
839  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(starting_pose.pose.orientation, starting_roll, starting_pitch, starting_yaw);
840  new_roll = starting_roll + pose_delta_subsampled[new_index_in_trajectory][3];
841  new_pitch = starting_pitch + pose_delta_subsampled[new_index_in_trajectory][4];
842  new_yaw = starting_yaw+ pose_delta_subsampled[new_index_in_trajectory][5];
843 
844  tf::Quaternion q_new = tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(new_roll, new_pitch, new_yaw);
845  q_new.normalize();
846  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_new,new_pose.pose.orientation);
847 
848  return new_pose;
849 }
850 
855 void audioGrabber(audio_emergency::AudioMessage::ConstPtr msg)
856 {
857  lock_emerg.lock();
858  if (msg->result == "talk") emergency = true;
859  lock_emerg.unlock();
860 }
861 
866 void safePauseFor(float duration)
867 {
868  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
869  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
870  while(ros::Time::now()-start < ros::Duration(duration))
871  {
872  ros::spinOnce();
873  if (!isAudioSafe() || !isForceSafe())
874  {
875  ROS_WARN_STREAM("ABORTING SEQUENCE!!");
876  fallback(true);
877  ros::shutdown();
878  }
879  loop_rate.sleep();
880  }
881 }
882 
888 void printPose(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose, std::string text)
889 {
890  double roll, pitch, yaw;
891  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(pose.pose.orientation, roll, pitch, yaw);
892  ROS_INFO_STREAM(text << pose.pose.position.x << " "
893  << pose.pose.position.y << " "
894  << pose.pose.position.z << " "
895  << angles::to_degrees(roll) << " "
896  << angles::to_degrees(pitch) << " "
897  << angles::to_degrees(yaw) << " " );
898 }
899 
906 void printGMRRow(std::vector<std::vector<float>> gmr, int row, std::string text)
907 {
908 
909  double roll, pitch, yaw;
910  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
911  pose.pose.position.x = gmr[row][1];
912  pose.pose.position.y = gmr[row][2];
913  pose.pose.position.z = gmr[row][3];
914  pose.pose.orientation.x = gmr[row][4];
915  pose.pose.orientation.y = gmr[row][5];
916  pose.pose.orientation.z = gmr[row][6];
917  pose.pose.orientation.w = gmr[row][7];
918 
919  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(pose.pose.orientation, roll, pitch, yaw);
920 
921  ROS_INFO_STREAM(text << pose.pose.position.x << " "
922  << pose.pose.position.y << " "
923  << pose.pose.position.z << " "
924  << angles::to_degrees(roll) << " "
925  << angles::to_degrees(pitch) << " "
926  << angles::to_degrees(yaw) << " " );
927 
928 }
929 
936 std::vector<std::vector<float>> subSamplePoseDelta(std::vector<std::vector<float>> pose_delta, int resultant_length)
937 {
938  int sampling_freq = pose_delta.size()/resultant_length;
939  std::vector<std::vector<float>> pose_delta_subsampled(resultant_length);
940  // Resize the subsampled set to have the number of rows as required by resultant length but number of columns same as pose_delta
941  for(int i=0; i< resultant_length; i++)
942  {
943  pose_delta_subsampled[i].resize(pose_delta[0].size());
944  }
945 
946  // Subsample pose_delta according to sampling frequency
947  for (int i=0; i<resultant_length; i++)
948  {
949  pose_delta_subsampled[i] = pose_delta[i*sampling_freq];
950  }
951 
952 
953 
954  return pose_delta_subsampled;
955 }
956 
962 void driveToPoseStep(int step_count,std::vector<std::vector<float>> pose_delta_subsampled )
963 {
964  ros::spinOnce();
965 
966  lock_pose.lock();
967  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose=current_pose;
968  lock_pose.unlock();
969 
970  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Moving to WP" << step_count);
971  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose_new = getNewPoseAtIndex(initial_pose, step_count, pose_delta_subsampled);
972  printPose(temp_pose , "Cur pose: ");
973  printPose(pose_new, "New pose: ");
974  cmd_pos.publish(pose_new);
975  waitForActionCompleted();
976  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Done");
977 }
978 
979 int main(int argc, char **argv)
980 {
981  ros::init(argc, argv, "feeder_gmm");
982  ros::NodeHandle nh;
983 
984  std::vector<std::vector<float>> gmr = getGMRFromCsv(argv[1]);
985  std::vector<std::vector<float>> pose_delta = getPoseDeltaFromGMR(gmr);
986  std::vector<std::vector<float>> pose_delta_subsampled = subSamplePoseDelta(pose_delta, SUB_SAMPLED_SIZE);
987 
988  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Size of GMR : " << gmr.size() << " pose_delta : " << pose_delta.size() << " pose_delta_subsampled : " << pose_delta_subsampled.size());
989 
990  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
991 
992  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("/force_values", 1000, forceGrabber);
993  cmd_vel = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>("/RobotControl/VelocityControl", 1000);
994  cmd_pos = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/RobotControl/PoseControl", 1000);
995  ros::Subscriber tool_pose = nh.subscribe("/j2s7s300_driver/out/tool_pose",1000, poseGrabber );
996  ros::Subscriber control_status = nh.subscribe("/RobotControl/Status",1000, statusGrabber );
997  ros::Publisher arm_pose_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/arm_state", 1000);
998  ros::Subscriber audio_emerg = nh.subscribe("/audio_emergency",1000, audioGrabber );
999 
1001  waitForPoseDataAvailable();
1002 
1003  double local_force_f;
1004  bool print_once_only=true;
1005 
1006  lock_pose.lock();
1007  initial_pose=current_pose;
1008  lock_pose.unlock();
1009 
1011  step_count = 0;
1012  int prev_step_count = 0;
1013 
1014  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
1016  while(ros::ok())
1017  {
1018  ros::spinOnce();
1019 
1020  lock_force.lock();
1021  local_force_f=force_f;
1022  lock_force.unlock();
1023 
1024 
1026  if (local_force_f >= 0 && local_force_f <= FORCE_F_1_2_THRESH && step_count >0)
1027  {
1028  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
1029  ROS_INFO_STREAM("STEP_DOWN for " << local_force_f << "N from step " << step_count);
1030  prev_step_count = step_count--;
1031  driveToPoseStep(step_count,pose_delta_subsampled);
1032  print_once_only=true;
1033  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
1034  ROS_INFO(" ");
1035 
1036  if (prev_step_count > step_count && step_count==0)
1037  {
1038  callFallbackTimer(3);
1039  }
1040  }
1041 
1043  else if (local_force_f >= FORCE_F_2_3_THRESH && local_force_f <= FORCE_SAFETY && step_count < SUB_SAMPLED_SIZE-1)
1044  {
1045  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
1046  ROS_INFO_STREAM("STEP_UP for " << local_force_f << "N from step " << step_count);
1047  prev_step_count = step_count++;
1048  driveToPoseStep(step_count,pose_delta_subsampled);
1049  print_once_only=true;
1050  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
1051  ROS_INFO(" ");
1052  }
1053 
1055  else if (print_once_only)
1056  {
1057  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
1058  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Do nothing.");
1059  print_once_only=false;
1060  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Step : " << prev_step_count << " -> " << step_count << " @ roll : " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll()));
1061  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
1062  ROS_INFO(" ");
1063 
1064  }
1065 
1066 
1067  loop_rate.sleep();
1068  std_msgs::Int32 arm_pose_msg;
1069  arm_pose_msg.data=step_count;
1070  arm_pose_pub.publish(arm_pose_msg);
1071  ros::spinOnce();
1072 
1074  if (!isAudioSafe())
1075  {
1076  ROS_WARN_STREAM("ABORTING SEQUENCE!!");
1077  fallback(true);
1078  ros::shutdown();
1079  }
1080  }
1081  return 0;
1082 }
